document_data.name: The Three Dead Orcs
document_data.mainbody: '''The Three Dead Orcs''' was an inn in the village of [[Maskyr's Eye]] in [[the Vast]] in the 13{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/57/The Everwinking Eye: At Home in Maskyr's Eye|21}}
document_data.History: The Three Dead Orcs burned down and, perhaps due to its name, some very much alive [[orc]]s were thought to have encouraged the flames. Afterward, [[Riothar Orlsyr]] built a new inn called [[The Wizard's Hand]] to the north, some time around [[1277 DR]].
